"Gathering information":
"\"Gathering\" refers to the collection of materials obtained from \"Harvesting\" and \"Fishing\".

By taking these materials to \"Franka's Cafe\", you can obtain Skill Rings and Cuisine Food."

"■ Harvesting
・By visiting a \"Harvesting Spot\", you can collect materials such as ore and minerals, as well as cuisine ingredients.
※By Harvesting, you will consume Harvesting Stamina.

■ Fishing
・By visiting a \"Fishing Spot\", you can collect fish and other sea creatures required for Cuisine Food.
※By Fishing, you will consume Fishing Stamina."

"■ Stamina Recovery
\u3000\u3000・Your stamina will recover automatically over time, however you can instantly recover stamina by using Star Gems.

■ \"Master & Good\" Items
\u3000\u3000・In addition to the usual options during \"Fishing\" and \"Harvesting\", you can increase the rate of certain materials by selecting the \"Good\" or \"Master\" items."
